Module com.kihachu.spaceiteration1
Package com.kihachu.spaceiteration1.camera

Class CameraController

java.lang.Object
com.kihachu.spaceiteration1.camera.CameraController
public class CameraController extends Object
Controller class for handling camera movements and interactions in a 3D space environment.

  • Constructor Details

    • CameraController

      public CameraController(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, javafx.scene.Camera camera, javafx.scene.Group group, javafx.scene.Scene scene, Universe universe)
      Constructs a CameraController object with the specified stage, camera, group, scene, and universe.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the primary stage of the application.
      camera - the camera used for the 3D view.
      group - the group representing the universe.
      scene - the scene containing the group.
      universe - the universe model containing all 3D objects.

    • setSpaceCraft

      public void setSpaceCraft(SpaceCraft spaceCraft)
      Sets the spacecraft and adds it to the universe group and to the spacecraft group.
      Parameters:
      spaceCraft - the spacecraft to be controlled and displayed.

    • clamp

      private double clamp(double value, double min, double max)
      Clamps a value between a minimum and maximum range.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to be clamped.
      min - the minimum value.
      max - the maximum value.
      Returns:
      the clamped value.
